newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo stocks moderately lower by early morning.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo stocks moderately lower by early morning.

text.p: Tokyo stocks traded moderately lower in early morning trade on Thursday, as participants stayed away from blue-chip exporters amid uncertainty over currencies ahead of the Group of Seven (G7) nations' summit meeting later this week, brokers said.
Bearishness over high-technology stocks on Wall Street also weighed down the market, they said.
At 0012 GMT, the 225-share Nikkei average was down 93.91 points, or 0.46 percent, at 20,403.94. Its September futures were 120 points lower at 20,460.
